title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 201.3 - Unusual classifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 201.3 - Unusual classifications

State Regulations

Notwithstanding the above toll schedule, the authority
reserves the right to determine whether any vehicle and/or load is of unusual
design, weight or construction and to determine the toll including surcharges
and permit fees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
201.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
